# VZNVMExpressControllerDeviceConfiguration

**Class**

The configuration object that represents an NVM Express Controller storage device.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZNVMExpressControllerDeviceConfiguration
```

## Overview

This device configuration creates a storage device that conforms to the [https://nvmexpress.org/wp-content/uploads/NVM-Express-1_1b-1.pdf].

The device configuration is valid only if used with [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZGenericPlatformConfiguration].

## Creating a new device configuration

- **init(attachment:)**: Creates a new NVM Express controller configuration with the storage device attachment you provide.

## Related Documentation

- **VZGenericPlatformConfiguration**: The platform configuration for a generic Intel or ARM virtual machine.

## Configurations

- **VZVirtioBlockDeviceConfiguration**: The configuration object that requests the creation of a virtual storage device in the guest system.
- **VZStorageDeviceConfiguration**: The common configuration traits for storage device requests.
- **VZUSBMassStorageDeviceConfiguration**: The configuration object that represents a USB Mass storage device.
- **VZDiskImageCachingMode**: An integer that describes the disk image caching mode.
- **VZDiskImageSynchronizationMode**: An integer that describes the disk image synchronization mode.

- VZStorageDeviceConfiguration
